title: WizardBody Props
description: Used as a wrapper for WizardStep content, where the wrapping element is customizable.

aria-label.description:
Adds an accessible name to the wrapper element when the content overflows and renders
a scrollbar.

aria-labelledby.description:
Adds an accessible name to the wrapper element by passing the the id of one or more elements.
The aria-labelledby will only be applied when the content overflows and renders a scrollbar.

children.description: Anything that can be rendered in the Wizard body (React component or element)

className.description: Additional classes spread to the wizard body

component.description: Component used as the wrapping content container (Type: React.ElementType)

hasNoPadding.description: Flag to remove the default body padding
